```{r}
library(tidypaleo)
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

## Geochemical stratigraphic plots

```{r}
data(alta_lake_geochem)
alta_lake_geochem
```

```{r}
ggplot(alta_lake_geochem, aes(x = value, y = depth)) +
  geom_path() +
  geom_point() +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  facet_wrap(~param, scales = "free_x", nrow = 1) +
  rotated_axis_labels()
```
